name: Muse Rima
description: A genius musician who serenades with her soul
story: A singer-songwriter who also serves as vocalist, instrumentalist, songwriter, and producer for the duo Maid Kingdom. She's wearing a maid costume for the sake of the band's image, but she doesn't know much about maids, so she feels a little awkward.

relations.description: Rima's friend and savior, Maid Chloe makes up Maid Kingdom's other half as its vocalist, lyricist, and choreographer.

specialty.name: A Bard's Gift
specialty.description: Overcoming a crisis has given her inspiration for new music.

type.name: Weakened
type.description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: Attacks with a quick shot of an arrow. A critical hit will decrease the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn.

skills.name: Hopeful Hymn
skills.description: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns and increasing Attack for 1 turn.
skills.enhanced_description: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 3 turns and increasing Attack for 2 turns.

enhancements.description: Increases Dual Attack chance.
Increases Dual Attack chance by 0.5%.
Increases Dual Attack chance by 1%.
Increases Dual Attack chance by 2%.
Increases damage dealt by Quick Shot.
Increases damage dealt by Quick Shot by 1%.
Increases damage dealt by Quick Shot by 3%.
Increases damage dealt by Quick Shot by 5%.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 2%.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 10%.
When using Quick Shot, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a chance to increase Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by 5%.
When using Quick Shot, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 20% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by 5%.
When using Quick Shot, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 50% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by 5%.
When using Quick Shot, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 100% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by 5%.
Increases Effectiveness.
Increases Effectiveness by 7%.
Increases Effectiveness by 15%.
Increases Effectiveness by 25%.
When using Lullaby Arrow, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns.
When using Lullaby Arrow, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 20% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns.
When using Lullaby Arrow, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 50% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns.
When using Lullaby Arrow, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 100% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns.
When using Quick Shot, has a chance to decrease Speed of the target for 1 turn.
When using Quick Shot, has a 15% chance to decrease Speed of the target for 1 turn.
When using Quick Shot, has a 45% chance to decrease Speed of the target for 1 turn.
When using Quick Shot, has a 75% chance to decrease Speed of the target for 1 turn.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 1%.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effectiveness of all allies by 5%.
When using Hopeful Hymn, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a chance to increase Speed of the target for 2 turns.
When using Hopeful Hymn, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 20% chance to increase Speed of the target for 2 turns.
When using Hopeful Hymn, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 50% chance to increase Speed of the target for 2 turns.
When using Hopeful Hymn, if all allies are Ice elemental Heroes, has a 100% chance to increase Speed of the target for 2 turns.
When using Lullaby Arrow, a critical hit has a chance to decrease Combat Readiness of the target by 10%.
When using Lullaby Arrow, a critical hit has a 20% chance to decrease Combat Readiness of the target by 10%.
When using Lullaby Arrow, a critical hit has a 50% chance to decrease Combat Readiness of the target by 10%.
When using Lullaby Arrow, a critical hit has a 100% chance to decrease Combat Readiness of the target by 10%.

debuffs.name: Sleep
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.

skill1.name: 速射
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃する。この攻撃でクリティカルが発生した場合、自身のスキルターンが1減少する。

skill2.name: 催眠の矢
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、75.0%の確率で睡眠を1ターンの間付与する。
skill2.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、75.0%の確率で睡眠を1ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 希望の賛歌
skill3.desc: 自身以外の味方単体のスキルターンを2減少させ、攻撃力UPを1ターンの間付与する。
